info.abstract:
[Type] Metadata Access
[Behaviour] Request the configuration parameters.
[Parameters] - key : name of the metadata to be request.
[System parameters] - objkey_filter : filter on the output of the operator written to file (default=all => no filter, none => no output). get_config : show config data as text.
[Examples] Get the URL where XML documents associated with Ophidia operators are located: OPH_TERM: oph_get_config key=OPH_XML_URL; SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_get_config;key=OPH_XML_URL;"
